The `flexibleTaskCheckbox`-helper will ...

{% raw %}

```handlebars
  {{flexibleTaskCheckbox}}
```

{% endraw %}

when used with this context:

```json
{
  path: 'notepages/school/My Cool Page',
  name: 'My Cool Page is here!'
}
```

will result in:

````markdown
...
````
